ActorTalk: Commandant, I found some of the stolen spices on the suspect.
F-Flourish Guild? I've never heard of it! I don't know anything!
I've contacted Celica. Someone will be here soon to transfer her to the proper department.
Right. Let's inform Akdilek and Ocean Heart as well.
But Commandant, this Flourish Guild you mentioned earlier... What exactly is it?
Did the Flourish Guild put you up to this?
